title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5305.2 - Gaming employee registration form
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5305.2 - Gaming employee registration form

State Regulations
(a) A gaming employee registrant shall file a gaming employee registration form the
commission supplies and may amend from time to time. (b) Each gaming employee registrant is
required to provide complete and accurate responses to the registration form, including, without limitation, disclosing any criminal convictions and other
misconduct of the applicant. (c) Each gaming employee registrant is required to fill out the registration form
completely and accurately. Incomplete or misleading information supplied on the
registration form may result in the denial of the
application. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
